gameRecap.title: Game Recap: Pelicans 103, 76ers 95
gameRecap.excerpt: The Pelicans win their third consecutive game as they defeat the 76ers, 103-95. Zion Williamson led New Orleans with 23 points and a season-high 12 rebounds, along with four assists as Naji Marshall added a season-high 19 points. Tobias Harris (21 points, 10 rebounds) and Kelly Oubre (20 points, seven rebounds) totaled 41 for the Sixers. The Pelicans improve to 38-25 as the 76ers move to 35-28.
